articles.title: SpaceX launches OneWeb Gen 2 technology demonstrator - SpaceNews
articles.description: SpaceX launched a technology demonstration satellite for OneWeb’s second-generation broadband constellation May 20, along with spares for the British firm’s current low Earth orbit network and another that U.S.-based Iridium Communications operates.
